mapper.select: SELECT i.policy_id, p.limit_quota, p.interval_unit, p.policy_name, a.api_id, a.api_code, a.api_name, a.api_category, a.service_id, a.path, r.url FROM gateway_rate_limit_api AS i INNER JOIN gateway_rate_limit AS p ON i.policy_id = p.policy_id INNER JOIN base_api AS a ON i.api_id = a.api_id INNER JOIN gateway_route AS r ON a.service_id = r.route_name WHERE p.policy_type = 'url'
